PolicyDocument.description: A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified SNS topics.
PolicyDocument.markdownDescription:
A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified SNS topics.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: ['object', 'string']  
Update requires: No interruption

Topics.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the topics to which you want to add the policy. You can use the [Ref](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/intrinsic-function-reference-ref.html)` function to specify an [AWS::SNS::Topic](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-sns-topic.html) resource.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Topics.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the topics to which you want to add the policy. You can use the [Ref](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/intrinsic-function-reference-ref.html)` function to specify an [AWS::SNS::Topic](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-sns-topic.html) resource.

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
